DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare androgen level ( serum total free testosterone ) woman preeclampsia normal one third trim pregnancy ( 28-40 week ) .
DOC.brief_title: Androgens Level Third Trimester Pregnancy Patients With Preeclampsia
DOC.detailed_description: Methodology : All woman study subject : - All woman candidate study accord inclusion exclusion criterion . - History take special emphasis last menstrual period determine exact Gestational age . - A reliable date define occurrence regular menstrual cycle ( 28±7 day ) patient take oral contraceptive three month conception irregular bleeding . - General abdominal examination patient determine patient match inclusion criterion . - Preeclampsia refers new onset hypertension ( systolic blood pressure ≥140 mmHg , diastolic blood pressure≥ 90 mmHg , , measure two occasion > 6 hour apart ) either proteinuria end organ dysfunction 20 week gestation previously normotensive woman . - At Ain Shams University Hospitals , investigator use ELISA base test system intend quantitative measurement total free testosterone patient group .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Pregnant woman ( primigravida ) third trimester i.e . 2840 week . 2 . Age 20 35 year old . 3 . Live fetus . 4 . Having history pregestational hypertension . 5 . Having history disease associate hormone disorder ( thyroid gland disorder , DM , hyperprolactinemia polycystic ovary syndrome ) . 6 . During pregnancy receive antihypertensive medication . 7 . Nonsmoker . 1 First second trimester pregnant woman . 2 Women young 20 year old old 35 year old 3 Intrauterine fetal death . 4 History pregestational hypertension . 5 History hormonal disorder ( thyroid gland disorder hyperprolactinemia ) . 6 Smoker . 7 Polycystic ovary syndrome . 8 Signs symptom hyperandrogenism ( hirsutism , acne , oily skin , etc. ) . 9 Diabetes mellitus . 10 Drug use except ordinary supplementation ( iron , folic acid ) .
